text: Gerald Weil Nachman (January 13, 1938 â€“ April 14, 2018) was an American journalist and author. He was born in Oakland, California. Nachman was a television writer for the San Jose Mercury News. He was a columnist for the New York Daily News and writer for the San Francisco Chronicle. Nachman died April 14, 2018 in San Francisco, California of frontotemporal dementia at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American television writers Category:American journalists Category:American columnists Category:American novelists Category:Writers from San Francisco Category:Writers from Oakland, California
title: Gerald Nachman
